QuestData.Title: A Dish Best Served Huge
QuestData.Description: Take this food, and put it in our old lifeboat, southeast of here along the coast. When Negolash smells all that food, he'll come running!$b$bAnd when he does, there will be a stouthearted $c ready to knock his corpse back into the briny deep.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Giant Crate of Giant Food to Captain Smotts' lifeboat, then use it to summon and kill Negolash.
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe my fortune, $n! Meeting you has turned my luck to the better, make no mistake there!$B$BIf I ever get a new ship and you're looking to sail the seas, you would be my honored guest.
